articles.title: Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar Closes
articles.content:
Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar Closes
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar closed with due ceremony at Yanggakdo International Hotel on Tuesday.
					Present there were Pak Su Gil, vice-premier and minister of Finance, So Tong Myong, general manager of the Korean National General Insurance Company who is chairman of the Organizing Committee of the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar, and officials of the company, insurance workers in local areas and officials concerned, the delegation of the Kumgang Insurance Company of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Ezzat Abdel-Bary, secretary general of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsures, and his party, Roberto Quinto Martinez, permanent secretariat of the Association of Insurance and Reinsurance in Developing Countries, and representatives of companies of China, Morocco, Sudan, Switzerland, Britain, India and Egypt.
					
					 Prior to its closing ceremony the seminar heard papers on marine cargo insurance, marine cargo claims and adjustment - an overview, the art of adjusting catastrophe claims, new trends in the reinsurance market and other papers. 
					
					 Then followed speeches. 
					
					 The participants discussed the issues of marine insurance and its related field and exchanged experience gained in the field.

articles.title: Letter from Participants in International Insurance Seminar
articles.content:
Letter from Participants in International Insurance Seminar
Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a letter of thanks by the participants in the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar on Tuesday.
					 The letter says: 
					
					 We would like to extend you our heartfelt thanks for your deep care and hospitality shown to us for the success of the event.
					
					 The seminar held under the co-auspices of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsurers and the Korean National General Insurance Company has made a considerable contribution to enhancing the role of marine insurance for the recovery of the ailing economies and sustainable economic growth in the aftermath of the global financial crisis.  
					
					 Furthermore, the seminar has been a good opportunity to increase mutual understanding and business ties between insurers of Asia, Africa and other parts of world.
					
					 Even though our stay here has been short, we were able to understand that the preventive and compensative function and the role of the insurance in your country is contributing to the effective betterment of people's life and economic development.
					
					 We shall endeavor to strengthen international cooperation in insurance sector on the principle of friendship and mutual benefits as well as to develop the close bonds with Korean underwriters.

articles.title: Cuban, Indonesian Embassies Help Korean Farms
articles.content:
Cuban, Indonesian Embassies Help Korean Farms
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Charge d'Affaires a.i. Bianka Rodriguez Suero and staff members of the Cuban embassy here did a friendly work on the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Hwasong Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Ryongsong District, Pyongyang, on Tuesday.
					 On the same day Charge d'Affaires a.i. Fitri Riyanti and staff members of the Indonesian embassy here did a similar work on the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Yaksu Cooperative Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City.
					
					 They helped the farmers in weeding.
					
					 The Indonesian embassy officials handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Gifts from British Companies
articles.content:
Gifts from British Companies
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received gifts from the Radohall Ltd. and the Cooper Gay Ltd. of UK.        
					 The gifts were conveyed to an official concerned on Tuesday by
					
					Rafael Miqueleiz, managing director of the Radohall Ltd., and Trevor John Brown, director of the Cooper Gay Ltd., attending the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar.
					
					 Meanwhile, a gift presented to Kim Jong Il by Jacques Aigeldinger, executive vice president of the Haakon Ltd. of Switzerland, was handed over to an official concerned on Monday.

articles.title: Pyongyang June 9 Ryongbuk Secondary School
articles.content:
Pyongyang June 9 Ryongbuk Secondary School
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang June 9 Ryongbuk Secondary School is widely known in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea for doing well in the education of the rising generation.
					 On June 9, Juche 58 (1969) President Kim Il Sung chose the site for the school and gave a name to it.
					
					 The school has made great achievements in helping the students get an ample knowledge, good moral character and good health.
					
					 Kim Jong Chol, 58, principal of the school, told KCNA that they have properly carried on instruction and edification, teaching administration and management of the school.
					
					 The work of improving qualifications is in progress among teachers, he said, and continued:
					
					The school has paid primary attention to carrying forward the immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il associated with it and gearing the contents of education to the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It has put education on IT and scientific basis by applying advanced methods in education.
					
					 Many experimental apparatuses and teaching aids made by the school have been used in education.
					
					 The students are working hard to advance in knowledge.
					
					 Many of the classes have the honor of classes of A students and B students and an increasing number of students have obtained the "July 15 Honor Student Prize" and "'Our Classroom' Literary Prize".
					
					 The school has also produced ten-odd winners of the Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize. Among the graduates from the school are heroes of the Republic and Doctors.
					
					 It, a Thrice Honored Red Flag School, has modern educational facilities, gymnasium and practice rooms.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Accused of Referring "Cheonan" Case to UNSC
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Accused of Referring "Cheonan" Case to UNSC
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group finally referred the case of its warship sinking to the UN Security Council on June 5 despite protest and denunciation at home and abroad. The group was reported to have "requested" it to "seriously deal with" the DPRK over the above-said case, groundlessly branding it as "a threat to global peace and security."
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The group's action is a vicious provocation to the DPRK as it was a despicable act of treachery which could be perpetrated only by the traitors and confrontation maniacs steeped in the wild ambition to stifle fellow countrymen to the marrow of their bones. 
					
					 The case of warship sinking that the puppet group referred to the UN is nothing but a joint product of the plot hatched by it together with foreign forces at a confab and the most hideous crime committed by it.
					
					 Clear is the aim sought by the group in bringing the case up for discussion at the UN as the truth about it has been brought to light. Its ulterior intention is to shift onto the DPRK the blame for the case of warship sinking at any cost and escalate the international sanctions against it through huddles with outside forces in a bid to do harm to it. 
					
					 When the plot to weather its serious ruling crisis by creating the "north wind" proved to be unworkable, the puppet group referred the case to the UN in an effort to internationalize it and further escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, backed by foreign forces. 
					
					 It would be well advised to stop behaving recklessly, well aware of the adverse consequences to be entailed by its farce. 
					
					 If the puppet group persistently works to seek additional sanctions against the DPRK by abusing the UN in league with foreign forces despite its warnings, it will be wholly to blame for the ensuing disastrous consequences, warns the commentary.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Joining in US Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Joining in US Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Japan has behaved in a disgusting manner since the outbreak of the case of "Cheonan's" sinking in south Korea. It took the lead in trumpeting about "international cooperation" and "joint action," echoing the U.S. call for escalating the confrontation with the DPRK.
					 When the U.S. got more vociferous crying out for tightening the sanctions against the DPRK over the conspiratorial case, Japan blustered that it would "slap more stringent sanctions" against the DPRK and has further intensified the suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), a dignified overseas compatriots organization of the DPRK.
					
					 Japan has gone the lengths of adopting a new "law on the special measure for cargo inspection" targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This indicates that Japan's rash action to do harm to the DPRK by zealously partaking of its master's sanctions against the DPRK has reached an extreme phase.
					
					 Lurking behind the above-mentioned behavior of Japan is its unlimited militarist ambition to realize its scenario for reinvasion come what may. 
					
					 Japan seeks to fish in troubled waters through the case of the warship' sinking as it is expanding the sphere of overseas aggression bit by bit, kowtowing to the U.S. master. 
					
					 When the above-said case broke out, Japan lost no time to adopt the said law which had been controversial since last year. This helps guess Japan's disposition and interests as a profiteer.
					
					 Japan insisted on its brigandish assertion that ships should be inspected not only in its territorial waters but in the open sea. In other words, Japan seeks to lay a springboard from which to launch overseas aggression, to be more exact, to stage a comeback to Korea under that pretext.
					
					 Nothing is more ridiculous than the calculation of Japan to get something by browbeating and pressurizing the DPRK through sanctions against it and suppression of Chongryon.
					
					 Japan's act of dancing to the tune of its U.S. master and sinister intention to fish in troubled waters through what happened on the Korean Peninsula would only land it in dire straits. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to seriously pay heed to the DPRK's warnings and stop going reckless.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Developing DPRK-China Friendship
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Developing DPRK-China Friendship
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's recent visit to China was a historic event as it strikingly demonstrated again the fact that the DPRK-China friendship is unbreakable.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The visit marked an epochal occasion in bringing the flower garden of the traditional DPRK-China friendship into fuller bloom, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The bilateral friendship is now growing stronger with each passing day thanks to the deep care and energetic activities of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's several visits to China and President Hu Jintao's visit to the DPRK in the new century have served as a driving force for developing in depth and vigorously the DPRK-China friendship onto a higher stage in conformity with the desire and interests of the two peoples.
					
					 Friendship factories, farms, cities, schools and others in the two countries have become symbols of the DPRK-China friendship. Exchange and cooperation have been steadily strengthened between the two countries, thus ensuring the dynamic progress of their socialist construction.
					
					  The events of "year of DPRK-China friendship", which took place last year, injected vitality in the strengthening of friendship and exchange between the two peoples and the development of the bilateral relations.
					
					 Revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl", adapted from immortal masterpiece "The Flower Girl", was successfully performed in China. And the performance of opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" by the Phibada Opera Troupe of the DPRK is now going on before full houses in China. Drama "A Sentry under a Neon Lamp" was reproduced and performed in the DPRK. These events delighted the two peoples and promoted the development of the DPRK-China friendship. This goes to prove that the asset of the bilateral friendship is being enriched in different fields as the days go by.
					
					 It is the precious fruition of the joint efforts made by the two parties and two peoples of the DPRK and China that the bilateral friendship has grown stronger in keeping with the desire and interests of the two peoples, displaying its great vitality.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK to steadily develop the DPRK-China friendship through generations, the article says, adding: They will strive to further develop and consolidate the traditional DPRK-China friendship which has stood all sorts of trials and tempest of history.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korean Declarations Called for
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The June 15 joint declaration is an immortal banner of national reunification and a great programme for independent reunification common to the nation as it clearly indicates the way for independently reunifying the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the most urgent task facing the Korean nation at present to meet all challenges of the anti-reunification forces and give a strong impetus to the trend of the era of independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 The moves of the south Korean conservative group to block the advance of the June 15 era of reunification and provoke a war of aggression against DPRK in collusion with foreign forces reached an extremely reckless phase with the case of the warship "Cheonan's" sinking as a momentum.
					
					 The prevailing situation urgently requires all the Koreans at home and abroad to resolutely meet the vicious challenges of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad with the might of the national unity and wage a dynamic movement for national reunification under the uplifted banner of the above-said declaration.
					
					 National reunification, the desire of all the Koreans, can be achieved only when the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are upheld and implemented. 
					
					 All the Koreans should never pardon the conservative group's such anti-reunification acts as defiling the inter-Korean declarations and categorically refusing to implement them.
					
					 They should roundly expose and denounce the conservative group's treacherous acts of having brought the inter-Korean relations to a collapse.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad should achieve positive solidarity and alliance irrespective of ideology, political view and ism and check and frustrate the puppet group's anti-reunification moves.
					
					 Peace is achievable only through a bold struggle to smash the moves of the warmongers at home and abroad to escalate the confrontation and start a war. 
					
					 The difficulties the Korean nation is facing in its way of the strenuous struggle for national reunification are temporary, but it is sure to triumph, the article notes, stressing: No force on earth can block the dynamic advance of all the Koreans towards independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: S. Korea's Warmongers Plan to Stage Their Saber Rattling
articles.content:
S. Korea's Warmongers Plan to Stage Their Saber Rattling
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Second Corps of the south Korean puppet army announced that it would stage military exercises for ground cooperation in the areas of Chunchon and Hwachon of south Korean Kangwon Province from June 9 to 11, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The south Korean warmongers blustered that all the units of the corps would be hurled into the exercises for conducting a large-scale search, reconnaissance and blockade operations and operating a mobile task force, etc. in the operational theatres for the purpose of helping them get familiar with the methods of carrying out their combat missions to cope with somebody's "infiltration" and "provocation." 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is making desperate efforts to bring the dark clouds of a war of aggression to hang over Korea, still inciting inter-Korean confrontation, oblivious of the lesson taught by the stern judgment meted out to it by the people.

articles.title: Proper Probe into "Cheonan" Case Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Proper Probe into "Cheonan" Case Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The secretary general of the Presbyterian Church in south Korea made public a statement on May 31 demanding a proper probe into the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking. 
					 The statement accused the authorities of turning down the just views of non-governmental organizations over the "results of investigation" into the case of warship sinking.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should listen to the voices of the believers and other people critical of the fabrication of the case and strive to settle the crisis peacefully, the statement urged.
					
					 It demanded the Lee Myung Bak regime roll back its policy of confrontation with the DPRK, restart dialogue, cooperation and exchange with it, definitely clear the people's doubts about the case of warship sinking and reorganize an investigation team for properly probing the case.

articles.title: Swedish Paper on US and S. Korea Forces behind "Cheonan" Case
articles.content:
Swedish Paper on US and S. Korea Forces behind "Cheonan" Case
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Swedish paper Proretaren No. 21 in a commentary said that the U.S. and south Korea were behind the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking.
					 Noting that the "evidence" produced by the south Korean authorities was not trustworthy at all, the commentary stressed it was not the DPRK but the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime that were interested in escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Lurking behind this case was an intention to more thoroughly isolate the DPRK and bring down Korean-style socialism through sanctions, the commentary said, and continued:
					
					 The cause of the case has not yet been fully clarified, but the world progressives will never be taken in by the plot of the south Korean puppet authorities.

articles.title: Honorary Title from San Miguel de Ibarra City, Ecuador
articles.content:
Honorary Title from San Miguel de Ibarra City, Ecuador
Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- San Miguel de Ibarra City, Imbabura Province of Ecuador, awarded its honorary title "Great Teachers" to President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk. 
					 An event for conveying the certificate of honorary title took place in the city on May 30.
					
					 The certificate was handed over to the head of the Korean Koryo medical cooperation group.
					
					 Written on the certificate are the following letters:
					
					 We present the certificate of "Great Teachers" to President Kim Il Sung, Marshal Kim Jong Il and Mrs. Kim Jong Suk of the DPRK in recognition of the feats performed by them who created a new history of the era of independence under the banner of human emancipation, devoted their all to building a new society for the cultural development of mankind free from exploitation and oppression and showed deep care for the cooperation among developing countries. Jorge Martinez Vasquez, mayor of San Miguel de Ibarra, and Lourdes Bucheli de Martinez, chairman of the Supporting Committee, on May 28, 2010.

articles.title: Struggle of WPK and Korean Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
Struggle of WPK and Korean Supported in Mexico
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- Nine political parties and organizations of Mexico, including the People's Socialist Party, released a joint statement on June 1 to mark the 10th anniversary of publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					The statement noted that a new era of independent reunification was opened and unprecedented successes were achieved in the development of the inter-Korean relations and the movement for national reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 We scathingly condemn the south Korean authorities for persisting in the confrontation policy in collusion with foreign forces after denying the June 15 joint declaration and demand that they respect the joint declaration and come out to dialogue and improvement of relations between the north and the south, squarely seeing the aspiration and will of the fellow countrymen to achieve the independent reunification and national prosperity.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in the struggle to repel every challenge of the separatist forces by the united efforts of the whole nation and accelerate the nationwide grand march for reunification under the slogan "Let the entire nation unite under the banner of the north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!" this year so as to brilliantly decorate 2010 as a year of bringing about a new phase of independent reunification.
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S., chiefly responsible for Korea's division, to respond to the consistent stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to put an end to the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S., provide durable peace-keeping mechanism in the Korean Peninsula through dialogue and negotiations and realize the denuclearization of the peninsula.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the U.S. and the south Korean group of traitors and their followers for staging the anti-DPRK smear campaign over the recent case of the south Korean puppet army's warship sinking and express solidarity with the Korean people who have turned out in the just struggle for showdown with the U.S. and the puppet group.
					
					 We call upon all political parties, governments and organizations of the world wishing for peace and reunification of Korea to fully support the WPK and the Korean people in the struggle to frustrate the moves of the separatist forces, achieve the independent reunification of the country and defend the security of the country and the sovereignty of the nation under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Mexico
Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued its bulletin No. 57 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "The Workers' Party of Korea, an invincible party" noted that June 19, 2010, is the 46th anniversary of his start of work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has developed the WPK into a party with transparent guiding idea, it said, and went on:
					
					 When starting his work at the WPK Central Committee, he clarified his will to hold fast to the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung as a guiding idea of the party and thoroughly apply it to party building and activities.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of the President as an integrated system of ideas, theories and methods of Juche and declared a programme for modeling the whole society on the Juche idea, thus ensuring that the whole party is equipped with the Juche idea.
					
					 He saw to it that every work was done in line with the idea and intention of the President, the founder of the WPK, and the way he did and the requirements of the Juche idea were fully met in all fields of party building and activities. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il has developed the WPK into a party which has achieved single-minded unity. 
					
					 The WPK under the great leader will always demonstrate its might as an invincible party.

articles.title: DPRK Significant Days Observed
articles.content:
DPRK Significant Days Observed
Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting and an art performance took place in Mexico and a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition and a Korean photo show were opened with due ceremonies in Russia and Brazil between May 22 and 29 to mark the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Displayed in the venues were photos on Kim Jong Il's immortal exploits, books and photos on Songun Korea and Korean handiworks.
					
					 Present at the events were personages of various circles and popular masses in those countries.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 A deputy mayor of Nezahualcoyotl City in Mexico State of Mexico noted with high appreciation that the WPK has developed into an invincible party with the steadfast guiding idea and a mass party united in mind which has taken its roots deep among the popular masses under the experienced and seasoned leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed that the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the development of the WPK for 40 odd years would remain long.
					
					 Censuring the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for their frantic and vicious smear campaign against the DPRK, the speaker expressed support for the DPRK's resolute and principled stand to defend the security of the country and the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK who doubles as chairman of the Brazilian Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung expressed full support and solidarity with the struggle of the heroic Korean people achieving signal successes under the leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The meeting in Mexico was followed by a performance given by Mexican artistes.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 8 (KCNA) -- One day in January Juche 93 (2004), Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il inspected a unit of the Korean People's Army. He made a stop in front of the billboard with pictures of exemplary soldiers.
					 After looking at the pictures, he told commanding officers of the unit that the pictures were fine but it would be better to take collective pictures of soldiers than individual ones.
					
					 With the officers hardly understanding what he meant, the supreme commander said that if they had many collective pictures, they would recollect their comrades-in-arms and worthwhile service after many years, seeing photo albums.

articles.title: Clausurado seminario internacional del seguro de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Clausurado seminario internacional del seguro de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 8 de junio (ATCC) -- Quedo clausurado el dia 8 en el Hotel Internacional Yanggakdo el seminario internacional del seguro de Pyongyang.
					Participaron en la ceremonia de clausura el vicepremier y ministro de Finanzas, Pak Su Gil, el presidente del comite organizador del foro y titular de la Compania General del Seguro Nacional de Corea, So Tong Myong, y otros funcionarios de esta compania, los trabajadores locales de la rama y otros interesados.
					
					Figuraban tambien la delegacion de la Sociedad Anonima del Seguro Kumgang de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), el secretario general de la Federacion de Seguros y Reseguros Afro-Asiaticos, Ezzat Abdel-Bary, y su comitiva, el secretario permanente de la Asociacion de Seguro y Reseguro de los paises en vias de desarrollo, Roberto Quinto Martinez, los delegados de las firmas de China, Marruecos, Sudan, Suiza, la India y Egipto.
					
					En el acto fue aprobada la carta de agradecimiento al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Al pronunciar el discurso de clausura, So Tong Myong enfatizo que la RPDC seguira esforzandose ingentemente por desarrollar la cooperacion entre los trabajadores y los intermediarios del seguro de varios paises del mundo.
					
					En el foro efectuado antes de la ceremonia se presentaron las disertaciones intituladas Investigacion general sobre el seguro maritimo, La sinopsis de la peticion y el pago de la prima del seguro maritimo, El metodo para tratar la solicitud de la prima en el caso de desastres, Nueva tendencia en el mercado del reseguro, etc.
					
					Los participantes discutieron los problemas sobre el seguro maritimo y otras ramas relacionadas e intercambiaron sus experiencias.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe la carta de participantes en seminario del seguro
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe la carta de participantes en seminario del seguro
Pyongyang, 8 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il recibio el dia 8 una carta que le dirigieran los participantes en el seminario internacional del seguro de Pyongyang para expresar agradecimiento.
					  Estamos profundamente agradecidos del Dirigente            Kim Jong Il por haber prestado profunda atencion a la marcha exitosa del seminario y dispensado la hospitalidad, senala la misiva y continua:
					
					  El presente seminario coauspiciado por la Compania General del Seguro Nacional de Corea y la Federacion de Seguros y Reseguros Afro-Asiaticos, hizo gran aporte a elevar el papel del seguro maritimo en recuperar cuanto antes la economia de varios paises del mundo estancada como consecuencia de la crisis financiera de alcance global y en lograr el desarrollo economico sostenido.
					
					  Tambien contribuyo mucho a profundizar el entendimiento mutuo y estrechar las relaciones de trabajo entre los funcionarios de la rama de varios paises de Asia, Africa y otras partes del mundo.
					
					  Aunque fue corta nuestra permanencia, hemos constatado en esta oportunidad que Corea eleva la funcion preventiva y remunerativa del seguro y su papel para que contribuya realmente a la vida del pueblo y al desarrollo economico.
					
					  En esta ocasion manifestamos nuestra decision de desarrollar los estrechos lazos con el seguro de Corea y fortalecer la cooperacion internacional en la rama de seguro en el principio de amistad y beneficio mutuo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 8 de junio (ATCC) -- Los titeres surcoreanos llevaron por fin el dia 5 al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU el incidente de hundimiento del buque surcoreano de guerra "Cheonan" a pesar de las protestas y criticas desatadas dentro y fuera del pais.
					De mal en peor, acusaron a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de "amenazar la paz y la seguridad internacionales" vinculandola con su buque naufragado y "solicitaron" a la ONU "tomar contramedidas rigurosas". 
					
					En un comentario individual difundido este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun critico tal comportamiento de la camarilla surcoreana calificandolo de repugnante acto antinacional y brutal provocacion contra la RPDC, de que son capaces solo los traidores colmados de la conciencia conflictiva con los connacionales y de la ambicion de atropellarlos, y continuo:
					
					El caso llevado esta vez a la ONU es la farsa de dimension supergrande orquestada por los titeres surcoreanos en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Sin embargo, ellos intentan imputar de esa manera a la RPDC la responsabilidad del buque siniestrado "Cheonan" e intensificar la sancion anti-RPDC en el ambito internacional para derrocarla finalmente. 
					
					Al ver frustrada su intriga de evadir la crisis de gobernacion mediante la "oleada contra el Norte" en torno al caso del "Cheonan", los titeres surcoreanos lo llevaron a la ONU con el fin de internacionalizarlo y seguir recurriendo a la campana conflictiva con la RPDC con el amparo de las fuerzas foraneas. 
					
					Seria conveniente a ellos que actuen con prudencia meditando en las consecuencias que emanen de su farsa.
					
					Si ellos imponen por fin en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras la sancion anti-RPDC abusando de la ONU y desoyendo la advertencia de la RPDC, tendran que responsabilizarse totalmente de la situacion catastrofica que causara ello.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena a Japon unido a la campana anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena a Japon unido a la campana anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de junio (ATCC) -- Despues del hundimiento del buque surcoreano de guerra "Cheonan", a instigacion de Estados Unidos, Japon se puso al frente de la campana contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando de la supuesta "cooperacion internacional" y "coordinacion".
					  Cuando EE.UU. armo el alboroto de sancion contra la RPDC pretextando ese caso, Japon dijo que "intensificaria las medidas de sancion" y reprime al mismo tiempo a la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon), digna organizacion de coreanos radicados en ultramar.
					
					  En ese sentido, aprobo hasta la nueva "ley de medida especial del control de cargas" a ser aplicada contra la RPDC.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 8 y continua:
					
					  Detras de la actitud demasiado activa de Japon en aplicar la sancion anti-RPDC esta su ambicion militarista de lanzar la nueva agresion a la RPDC.
					
					  De ahi que amplia poco a poco la esfera de agresion a ultramar bajo el abrigo de su amo norteamericano.
					
					  En su intento de sacar provechos del incidente "Cheonan", Japon lo tomo como pretexto para aprobar apresuradamente la ley arriba mencionada que era una polemica desde el ano pasado.
					
					  De esta manera, el pais isleno pretende echar la base de la agresion a ultramar, especificamente, a Corea partiendo de la logica de bandido de "registrar las embarcaciones" en sus aguas jurisdiccionales y en alta mar.
					
					  Resulta muy ridiculo que Japon tratara de conseguir algo amedrentando y presionando a la RPDC mediante la sancion y la represion contra la Chongryon.
					
					  El debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que sufrira el fracaso mas grande si sigue bailando al son de su amo gringo para sacar provechos de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Amistad Corea-China esta en pleno desarrollo, subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Amistad Corea-China esta en pleno desarrollo, subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 8 de junio (ATCC) -- La reciente visita a China del Dirigente Kim Jong Il es un evento historico que manifesto de nuevo a todo el mundo lo inquebrantable de la amistad Corea-China. 
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido en su edicion de este martes y prosigue:
					
					Esa visita devino la oportunidad trascendental para enriquecer la tradicional amistad Corea-China. 
					
					En la actualidad, ella se fortalece y se desarrolla de dia en dia gracias a la profunda atencion y las actividades energicas de los maximos dirigentes de ambos paises.
					
					La visita del Dirigente a China, realizada en varias ocasiones en el nuevo siglo, y la del Presidente Hu Jintao a Corea, sirvieron de fuerza motriz para desarrollar en la etapa mas alta la amistad Corea-China con mas profundidad y vigor conforme a la aspiracion y los intereses de los pueblos de los dos paises. 
					
					Las fabricas, las granjas, las ciudades y las escuelas hermanadas, etc. que existen en los dos paises, son simbolos de la amistad Corea-China. 
					
					Se amplian incesantemente el intercambio y la cooperacion entre los dos paises, que impulsan energicamente la construccion socialista en ambas partes. 
					
					  Los actos por el "Ano de amistad Corea-China", realizados en el ano pasado, fomentaron la amistad y el intercambio entre los pueblos de los dos paises y resultaron la dinamica del desarrollo de los vinculos bilaterales. 
					
					  Luego del estreno en China de la opera revolucionaria coreana "La florista", adaptada de la obra maestra homonima, se ofrece ahora con gran  exito en las ciudades chinas la opera "El sueno en la camara roja", adaptada por el Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre de Corea de la novela clasica china de igual nombre. 
					
					  Ademas, multiplica la alegria de los dos pueblos el drama chino "Centinela bajo la lampara de neon" interpretado por el Conjunto Dramatico Nacional de Corea. 
					
					  Estas actividades artisticas impulsaron el desarrollo de la amistad Corea-China y comprueban que se amplia la tesoreria de esta amistad en varios dominios. 
					
					  Hoy en dia, la amistad Corea-China se fortalece conforme a la aspiracion y los intereses de los dos pueblos y manifiesta su gran vitalidad, gracias a los esfuerzos conjuntos de los partidos y los pueblos de ambas partes. 
					
					  El Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano mantienen la invariable posicion de consolidar generacion tras generacion la tradicional amistad Corea-China que ha superado todas las pruebas de la historia y se esforzaran activamente en este sentido.
